text: In Tamil and Malayalam languages, Thaali is the name for a mangala sutra, a necklace that a groom ties around the bride's neck in a ceremony called Mangalya Dharanam. Thaali may also refer to: * Thaali (1993 film), Malayalam film directed by Sajan * Thaali (1997 film), Tamil film directed by E. V. V. Satyanarayana == See also == * Thali (disambiguation)
title: Thaali (disambiguation)
